resources.string: \nThis program manipulates the camera LED on the Nexus phones.This app should theoretically work with devices on JellyBean and up.Currently tested to be working on the following devices:

Nexus 5
Galaxy Nexus
Samsung Galaxy Grand
Samsung Note
some Micromax device
Let me know if the application works with devices other than the ones above.\ncontact_info:
Warning: Leaving the LED on for a long time might overheat it.Even the risk, that prolonged usage could damage the LED is explicitly stated hereby. Hence use at your own risk!\n
